'''"Rtawahist Flag"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Rtawahist Flag" was temporarily obtainable by reaching 900 [[A Parade of Providence#Gala Excitement|Gala Excitement]] during the [[A Parade of Providence]] Event in [[Version 3.6]], and was permanently added to the [[Realm Depot]] stock in [[Version 3.8]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
